articles.title: Settlement and Innovation 476,000 Years Ago: Archaeologists Discover World's Oldest Wooden Structure - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Research from the University of Liverpool and Aberystwyth University reveals humans were constructing wooden structures 476,000 years ago at Kalambo Falls, Zambia. This discovery, dated using advanced techniques, highlights the early human capability to settl…
